# JRA Award for Best Older Male Horse

The  is a title awarded annually by the Japan Racing Association (JRA) to an outstanding horse of that category in Thoroughbred horse racing in Japan. Since 1987 the honor has been part of the JRA Awards.
Records
Most successful horse (2 wins):
* Orfevre – 2012, 2013
* Kitasan Black – 2016, 2017
